identity.name: E1
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Gaming UI with Fintech precision
Emotion First: Every interaction feels like a 'kill confirm'
Content is King: Tournaments are the hero
Zoom In: Focus on prize pools and entry fees
Negative Space: Don't clutter, let the neon breathe
Contrast: Blackest blacks vs Brightest neons

usage.h1: text-5xl md:text-7xl font-bold uppercase tracking-tighter leading-none
usage.h3: text-xl md:text-2xl font-semibold uppercase tracking-wide text-primary
usage.label: text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-[0.2em] text-muted-foreground

rules: Use gradients sparingly, only for 'Live' or 'Hot' elements
Backgrounds must be deep blue-black (#020617), never pure black
Borders should be subtle (#1E293B) unless active/hovered
Text contrast must be high (White on Dark)

gradients.hero: bg-gradient-to-r from-yellow-400 via-orange-500 to-red-500 bg-clip-text text-transparent

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle noise texture overlay on the main background to reduce digital flatness

buttons.primary: rounded-none skew-x-[-10deg] bg-primary text-primary-foreground font-bold uppercase tracking-wider hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(250,204,21,0.5)] transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: rounded-none border border-primary/50 text-primary hover:bg-primary/10 font-bold uppercase tracking-wider

cards.tournament: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl border border-border bg-card hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300
cards.stats: p-6 rounded-xl bg-card border border-border flex flex-col gap-2

inputs.default: bg-background/50 border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-md

special.glitch: Use for main headings on hover

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL: npm install framer-motion lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge
SETUP: Update tailwind.config.js to include the custom colors and fonts.
SETUP: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css.
SETUP: Update the CSS variables in index.css to the 'Electric & Neon' palette provided.
DEV: Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Sidebar (for Admin) and Navbar (for Users).
DEV: Ensure all images have alt text and are optimized.
DEV: For the Payment Proof upload, create a drag-and-drop zone using standard HTML input type='file' styled with Tailwind.
CRITICAL: The Admin Dashboard must be dense. Use tables for user lists and tournament lists.
CRITICAL: The User Tournament Page must be visual. Use large cards with images.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a main heading.
Ensure mobile responsiveness. Stack grids on mobile.
